title: Towards Total Online Unsupervised Anomaly Detection and Localization in Industrial Vision. (arXiv:2305.15652v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Although existing image anomaly detection methods yield impressive results, they are mostly an offline learning paradigm that requires excessive data pre-collection, limiting their adaptability in industrial scenarios with online streaming data. Online learning-based image anomaly detection methods are more compatible with industrial online streaming data but are rarely noticed. For the first time, this paper presents a fully online learning image anomaly detection method, namely LeMO, learning memory for online image anomaly detection. LeMO leverages learnable memory initialized with orthogonal random noise, eliminating the need for excessive data in memory initialization and circumventing the inefficiencies of offline data collection. Moreover, a contrastive learning-based loss function for anomaly detection is designed to enable online joint optimization of memory and image target-oriented features. translated_title: 到达工业视觉中的总体在线无监督异常检测与定位
translated_abstract: 虽然现有的图像异常检测方法取得了令人印象深刻的结果，但它们大多是需要过多预先收集数据的离线学习范式，在需要在线流数据的工业场景中限制其适应性。基于在线学习的图像异常检测方法更适用于工业在线流数据，但鲜为人知。本文首次提出了一种完全在线学习的图像异常检测方法，名为LeMO，即为在线图像异常检测学习记忆，其利用的是学习性记忆，经初始化为正交随机噪声，消除了内存初始化的过度数据需求和离线数据收集的低效性。此外，为了实现在线内存和图像目标导向特征的联合优化，还设计了基于对比学习的异常检测损失函数。所提出的方法简单而高效。大量实验证明了其有效性。
tldr: 本文提出一种名为LeMO的在线学习图像异常检测方法，本方法使用学习性记忆，包含了基于对比学习的异常检测损失函数，可同时优化内存和图像特征，能够适应工业在线流数据需求，具有高效性和简单性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an online learning image anomaly detection method named LeMO, which utilizes learnable memory and a contrastive learning-based loss function for joint optimization of memory and image target-oriented features. This method is efficient and simple, and can adapt to the demand for industrial online streaming data.
